name: Fatato
description:
Your owner is wondering what food to make. Since the vegetables did not want to be the candidate. They decided to use your family as the sacrifice.  Stop your family from turning into a "Healthy" Snack.

This is my first game in which I tried to make it within a day. I worked on this with 4 other people and I'm open for suggestions for improvement.                

PS. Don't hate on the concept. Its a Game Jam.

Thanks hope you Enjoy
